titles.title: Home Ownership Moves the Economy (HOME) Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand and extend the first-time homebuyer credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/10/2009--Introduced. Home Ownership Moves the Economy (HOME) Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) extend the first-time homebuyer tax credit to all individuals who purchase a principal residence (currently, only first-time homebuyers as so defined); (2) extend such credit and the waiver of recapture requirements for such credit through 2010; and (3) repeal the limitation on such credit based on modified adjusted gross income.
